name: url_fetcher
title: URL Fetcher
summary: Fetches (and uploads) a file from a remote URL (suitable for retrieving public datasets, or data from your own HTTP/FTP server)

inputSpec.name: url
inputSpec.label: URL
inputSpec.help: The URL to fetch data from.

inputSpec.name: output_name
inputSpec.label: Output name
inputSpec.help: The name of the resulting file (optional; if not provided, the file will be called after the last part of the URL).

inputSpec.name: tags
inputSpec.label: Tags
inputSpec.help: A set of tags (string labels) that will be added to the resulting file object. (You can use tags and properties to better describe and organize your data).

inputSpec.name: properties
inputSpec.label: Properties
inputSpec.help: A set of properties (key/value pairs) that will be added to the resulting file object. (You can use tags and properties to better describe and organize your data).

outputSpec.name: file
outputSpec.label: File
outputSpec.help: The resulting file fetched from the URL.
